name: Limited Edition Magenta SlingShot
description: HANDCRAFTED LIMITED EDITION SEEDBOM SLINGSHOT Produced in a limited edition of 20 by Christopher Jarratt for Kabloom and available in a choice of 2 exclusive colours. These slingshots are hand-carved from found branches of birch, willow, oak, hornbeam or beech; therefore no 2 are the same and each slingshot will be slightly different in shape, size and pattern. (Please choose your prefered wood option from the dropdown list, if it's not there then it is sold out) The hardwood y-forked branch is selected from fallen trees in English woodlands. They are then hand whittled and shaped, sprayed (each design is unique) and finished with a clear gloss lacquer. The rubber is the highest grade silicone rubber and the pouch is 2.5mm thick Italian leather. Each slingshot is GPS mapped to it’s original location from where it was found in the woods. Each SlingShot is stamped with its unique number and signed authenticity tag, and is supplied in an exlusive handmade Kabloom ammo crate style wooden presentation box. FREE NEXT DAY DELIVERY VIA COURIER TO UK DESTINATIONS (excluding Highlands and Islands) By Christopher Jarratt for Kabloom Ltd. You can find out more about Christopher Jarratt here: http://www.christopherjarratt.com/about-christopher-jarratt/

name: Winter Wildflower
description: CREATE A FESTIVE FEEDING FRENZY Contains a wildflower mixture to attract butterflies, bees and other insects during the summer and produce seeds and grains for wild birds to feed on during the cold winter months. Includes a biodegradable jute sting for decorative hanging before use. SOAK IT Trigger your seedbom by placing it in water until soaked. THROW IT Throw you seedbom into abandoned and derelict ground. Look for signs of soil and natural light. GROW IT March - May Aug - Oct (Autumn throwing will flower the following year) Seedboms are handmade in the UK from recycled, organic, eco-friendly and biodegradable materials. The packaging is produced from 95% pre and post consumer recycled waste, is printed using vegetable based inks and is glue free. Size – W50mm H80mm Weight – 25g CUSTOMISE ME - Contact us for details (minimum order - 100 units)

name: Great British Bloomer
description: BREAK DOWN BORDERS WITH BRITISH BLOOMERS Contains a mix of quick blooming wildflowers and cultivated flower species to give a burst of brilliant British red, whites and blues. 20% of all sales go to GuerrillaGardening.org to help support Guerrilla Gardening activites in the UK. SOAK IT Trigger your seedbom by placing it in water until soaked. THROW IT Throw you seedbom into abandoned and derelict ground. Look for signs of soil and natural light. GROW IT March - May Seedboms are handmade in the UK from recycled, organic, eco-friendly and biodegradable materials. The packaging is produced from 95% pre and post consumer recycled waste, is printed using vegetable based inks and is glue free. Size – W50mm H80mm Weight – 25g CUSTOMISE ME - Contact us for details (minimum order - 100 units)

name: The London Honey Co Urban BeeBom
description: SUPPORT BEES IN THE CITY The Special Edition London Honey Co. Urban BeeBom contains a specially selected urban bee friendly mix of nectar rich wildflowers favoured by city dwellers of the Honeybee variety. The London Honey Company Ten years ago Steven Benbow decided to keep bees in Central London — it was the start of a thriving urban business. Keeping bees happy requires a lot of work, and a nomadic lifestyle. Find more info on urban bee keeping at: www.thelondonhoneycompany.co.uk SOAK IT Trigger your seedbom by placing it in water until soaked. THROW IT Throw you seedbom into abandoned and derelict ground. Look for signs of soil and natural light. GROW IT March - May Aug - Oct (Autumn throwing will flower the following year) Seedboms are handmade in the UK from recycled, organic, eco-friendly and biodegradable materials. Size – W50mm H80mm Weight – 25g CUSTOMISE ME - Contact us for details (minimum order - 100 units)

name: BloomBox 6 Single Seedboms
description: The new BloomBox, is a gift box based on our signature Seedbom ammo crate design. Our hand built hamper style crates are filled with a selection of Seedboms. This selection includes: 1 x Ammo crate style BloomBox 6 x Classic Single Seedbom varieties BloomBoxes are hand built from PEFC certified nordic plywood and are finished with a natural oil based UV protective coating. BloomBoxes are suitable for outdoor use. Seedbom multi set includes our range of classic Single Seedboms: Sunflower Power, Poppy PeaceBom, LoveBom, Pollinator, Cornflower FieldBom and a ThymeBom. A BloomBox makes the perfect alternative gift hamper for any aspiring Guerrilla Gardener. Dimensions L 400mm W170mm H150mm

name: BloomBox Select
description: The new BloomBox is a gift box based on our signature Seedbom ammo crate design. Our hand built hamper style crates are filled with a selection of Seedboms. This selection includes: 1 x Ammo crate style BloomBox 2 x Seedbom 4 packs OR 1 x Ammo crate style BloomBox 8 x Seedbom Singles (our whole range of singles exluding seasonal varieties) BloomBoxes are hand built from PEFC certified nordic plywood and are finished with a natural oil based UV protective coating. BloomBoxes are suitable for outdoor use. Seedbom 4 Packs option inlude the Wildflower Selection containing Poppy PeaceBom, LoveBom, Pollinator, Cornflower FieldBom and the Senses Selection containing Sunflower Power, Basil, Nasturtium and ThymeBom. A BloomBox makes the perfect alternative gift hamper for any aspiring Guerrilla Gardener. Dimensions L 400mm W170mm H150mm

name: BloomBox Full Armory
description: The new BloomBox is a gift box based on our signature Seedbom ammo crate design. Our hand built hamper style crates are filled with a selection of Seedboms. Single Seedboms include Poppy PeaceBom, LoveBom, Pollinator, Cornflower FieldBom, Sunflower Power, ThymeBom, the London Honey Co Urban BeeBom and the GuerrillaGardening.org Great British Bloomer. The BloomBox Full Armory includes our full range, represents the best value and makes the perfect alternative gift hamper for any aspiring Guerrilla Gardener. Dimensions L 400mm W170mm H150mm

name: Wildflower Selection 4 Pack
description: WILDFLOWER SEEDBOMS FOR BEES AND BUTTERFLIES Our seedbom 4 packs give you the opportunity to try your hand at seedbombing with 4 different results. Each seedbom is colour coded and packaging contains a handy guide to help you achieve the best results. Great for a family, a group of friends or even a budding individual seedbomber. Each pack of 4 seedboms contains the following varieties: Nectar Mix (Nectar Rich Wildflower Mix for Bees), Cornflower, Corn Poppy, Forget-Me-Not SOAK IT Trigger your seedbom by placing it in water until soaked.
